channel.title: Korasi spec 602 gfx& anims + hitsplats with icon beside
channel.description: Hey i need help with getting the real korasi special attack, i have been searching in like 3-4 hours but didnt find anything and i need the hitsplats with icons beside

item.title: Korasi spec 602 gfx& anims + hitsplats with icon beside
item.dc:creator: @moha488 moha488
item.description:
@moha488 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:550522”]Just add 602 anims and gfx. Something like http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/515785-reupload-602-animations-gfx.html

Then use the korasi gfx and anim like you would any other special.

As for the hitsplats with icons:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/387997-pi-hitmarks-fading-floating-critical.html[/quote]

and i got this

                            if(npcs[i].attackType == 0){//Melee
                                    c.handleHitMask(damage,0,0);
                            }
                            if(npcs[i].attackType == 1){//Range
                                    c.handleHitMask(damage,0,1);
                            }
                            if(npcs[i].attackType == 2){//Magic
                                    c.handleHitMask(damage,0,2);
                            }
